thread.title: Dramatic moment London-bound Jet Airways flight is intercepted by two fighter jets after it lost radio contact over Germany in footage from BA plane
thread.title_full: Dramatic moment London-bound Jet Airways flight is intercepted by two fighter jets after it lost radio contact over Germany in footage from BA plane

author: swebb
title: Dramatic moment London-bound Jet Airways flight is intercepted by two fighter jets after it lost radio contact over Germany in footage from BA plane
text:
Opinion PANIC AT 30,000FT Dramatic moment London-bound Jet Airways flight is intercepted by two fighter jets after it lost radio contact over Germany in footage from BA plane 
A pair of German Air Force Eurofighters intercepted a Jet Airways 777-300ER Video BY SAM WEBB 20th February 2017, 1:01 pm AN INCREDIBLE video shows two German fighter jets scrambled to escort a London-bound passenger plane after the pilot lost contact. 
A pair of German Air Force Eurofighters intercepted a Jet Airways 777-300ER heading for the capital from Mumbai on saturday after it failed to respond on the appropriate air traffic control frequencies. Facebook/CirrusPilot At first just one fighter jet was seen next to the airliner Facebook/CirrusPilot The two jets pull alongside the passenger jet headed for London Facebook/CirrusPilot 3 The footage was taken inside a nearby BA jet 
The incredible footage was captured from a British Airways plane close to the incident in the skies over Cologne in Germany. 
Aviation enthusiast CirrusPilot wrote on Facebook: “The JA pilots saw the Eurofighters and after speaking over emergency frequencies the plane carried onto London.” Related stories FLIGHT DIVERSION Flights to Cardiff diverted after plane forced to circle around airport for 40 minutes because of heavy fog FINAL GOODBYE Heartbreaking moment widow meets her army hero husband's coffin on the airport tarmac - and reduces an entire plane of passengers to tears 'BOMB TO TORONTO' Suspicious note causes evacuation on Toronto bound plane in Istanbul SPACE SPOOKS Mysterious US Air Force SPACE PLANE looks set to return from top secret mission after two years in orbit REAL LIFE TOP GUN Russian fighter pilots show off brand new warplane in video-game style footage of the jet tearing through skies at 1,500mph However, many people have noticed a small dark object in the footage that appears to be moving very quickly, sparking speculation it is a UFO.
But aviation experts were quick to dismiss the claim. one said: “The crossing dark spot is the shadow of higher traffic cast on the cloud top. It’s speed is typical of jet traffic. 
“Nothing unusual about it at all.”
